text: Century Series is the nickname of a group of fighter aircraft built in USA for the Cold War. It was all aircraft with number 100 in the code. * North American F-100 Super Sabre. * McDonnell F-101 Voodoo. * Convair F-102 Delta Dagger. * Lockheed F-104 Starfighter. * Republic F-105 Thunderchief. * Convair F-106 Delta Dart. * North American YF-107 Ultra Sabre. ==Bibliography== * Category:United States military aircraft
title: Century Series
